mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_amt, i_no, m_id, cart_regdate) values(#{ cart_amt },#{ i_no },#{ m_id },now())
mapper.select: select * from cart_view where m_id = #{ m_id }
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_no = #{ cart_no }
mapper.select: select * from cart_view where i_no=#{ i_no } and m_id = #{ m_id }
mapper.update: update cart set cart_amt = #{ cart_amt } where m_id=#{ m_id } and i_no=#{ i_no }
